title: serve the home page
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/' endpoint successfully serves the home page with correct content and status code.

title: serve the about page
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/about/' endpoint successfully serves the about page with correct owner information and status code.

title: list all projects
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/projects/' endpoint returns a list of all projects with their details, images, and descriptions.

title: show details of a specific project
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/projects/<id>/' endpoint returns the correct project details for a valid project ID and handles invalid IDs gracefully.

title: list all services
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/services/' endpoint returns a list of all services offered with their descriptions and categories.

title: serve the contact form
description: Verify that the GET request to the '/contact/' endpoint serves the contact form page correctly.

title: handle contact form submission
description: Verify that the POST request to the '/contact/' endpoint correctly processes the contact form submission, including validation and sending of messages.
